ch.suisa.fri.view
Class Console

java.lang.Object
  ch.suisa.fri.view.Console

public class Console
extends java.lang.Object

This Class implements Methods for the User Interface which are used very often The code gets smaller and clearer

Constructor Summary
Console()
           
 
Method Summary
 void clear()
          This Method "clears" the console It just adds a few empty lines, so the text doesn't get visible (but it's still there...)
 void pause()
          Waits for User input "pauses" the program
 void print(java.lang.String s)
          Prints a normal String Instead of "System.out.println(string) the code only contains "console.print(string)" The code gets smaller
 void printLine()
          Just prints a line, so the lines in the console are always the same width
 java.lang.String promt(java.lang.String s)
          This method makes the code a lot lighter Instead of asking for an Input every time, the code gets directly the input back
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
